main event: A couple reported seeing a bright glowing object in Urbana, Ohio, in March 1966.
interesting points: The observation lasted for about 15 minutes., The object was stationary and exhibited a bright light that the witness compared to Jupiter., The wife noticed the object first, prompting her husband to look., The Air Force concluded that there was insufficient data for evaluation., The witness's background in aviation led him to believe he could identify aircraft.
witness description: A husband and wife; the wife initially noticed the object and called her husband to observe.
